remarks: Relate ` OutsideOf ` to ` Seg<_ ` .  Theorem 6.13 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 24-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: outsidele $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( P OutsideOf <. A , B >. -> ( <. P , A >. Seg<_ <. P , B >. <-> A Btwn <. P , B >. ) ) ) $.
